banner.heading: StoreFront Layer Features
banner.subHeading: Top features that help effortlessly build online selling sites and boost sales

powerful.heading: Powerful toolset to enable commerce websites
powerful.subHeading: A comprehensive cloud-native platform to power everything regarding eCommerce

contents.title: Pre-built interface/application
contents.des: The interface is optimized to enhance the user experience when purchasing, making shopping process more convenient than ever.

contents.title: Actively customize the interface easily
contents.des: Businesses can adjust the interface easily without knowledge of IT or design. Just some simple steps and you will have a SEO-standard website optimized in shopping experience.

contents.title: Mobile-friendly
contents.des: Your website will be optimized to fit mobile devices, thereby providing the best customer experience and increasing conversion rates.

contents.title: Smart data management tool
contents.des: Our AI tools support creating useful filters based on customer information to deliver personalized shopping experience and higher conversion rates.

contents.title: Customer journey tracking
contents.des: Categorize and separate each specific audience group to create promotions, offers and send email marketing for better response and increased growth.

contents.title: Single dashboard to monitor orders
contents.des: Complete one or more orders with just one click, making order management easier than ever.

contents.title: Update order status in real time
contents.des: Update order status in real-time, thereby guiding customers throughout their purchase.

contents.title: Products, variants & catalog management
contents.des: Follow international standards like GS1 or eClass with our integrated Product Information Management (PIM), which manages complex products in an efficient manner.

contents.title: Effectively keep track of orders
contents.des: Automatic email notification journeys proactively notify order routes, avoiding delays or missed scenarios.

contents.title: Customized email structure and content
contents.des: You can completely customize these useful email notification templates to suit your needs and the way your business operates easily.

contents.title: Build trusts of customers
contents.des: Gain the trusts from customers through detailed payment confirmation, order information update, password update, etc.

contents.title: Free integration of payment gateways
contents.des: IChiba OnePlatform supports free integration of multiple payment gateways to make shopping more convenient for customers.

contents.title: Free SSL Support - Enhanced security
contents.des: Your website will come with a free SSL certificate, which secures all pages, credit card and transaction information.

contents.title: Product status report
contents.des: Collected data provides sellers with a detailed report on inventory levels, best-selling products, and sales trends over time, which will support making right decisions to promote businesses.

contents.title: Advanced commerce reporting with Google Analytics
contents.des: With the Enhanced Ecommerce feature on Google Analytics, sellers can effortlessly track where sales, visits, and referrals are coming from, thereby giving a deeper understanding of advertising performance and customer insights.

contents.title: Synchronizing system with hundreds of carriers
contents.des: Integrating popular carriers in your country to manage and process orders quickly and efficiently in just one place.

contents.title: Centralizing & delivering thousands of orders
contents.des: The shipping management dashboard ables to process and monitor from a few hundred to thousands of orders easily and centrally in just one place.

contents.title: Order status report
contents.des: Check bills of lading, track the delivery process and update incentives from carriers. Send real-time reports about order status at any time.

contents.title: Flexible placements of product recommendations
contents.des: Collect user-specific data, such as the customer’s most-viewed categories, products, and purchase history to give relevant recommendations for customers through website pages or marketing campaigns.

contents.title: Content-based filtering system
contents.des: Suggest similar products that are grouped together based on certain attributes, so shoppers can have more options and quickly drive buying decisions.

contents.title: Collaborative filtering feature
contents.des: Using AI models and reports to predict what might interest a person based on the taste of many other users.

support.heading: Start building your own selling website with IChiba OnePlatform

contents.title: 1. What is the cost for a IChiba OnePlatform StoreFront Layer Tool?
des: There is no set amount, as we provide pricing tailored to each merchant’s needs at any stage of growth.
For more information about pricing, please contact our sales team.

contents.title: 2. Can I use IChiba OnePlatform StoreFront Layer Tool if I don’t have an IT team?
des: Yes. You can definitely use IChiba OnePlatform StoreFront Layer Tool without having IT knowledge. We have an enthusiastic and well-trained technical team to support and follow your requirements.

contents.title: 3. What should I do if the website has errors or bugs?
des: IChiba OnePlatform have a global support team who is willing to assist you anytime. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need help.
